attributes.action: open a club for teenagers in Ringland, newport, southwales
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I think there is a lot of problems in Ringland in South wales. Newport when it comes to drinking and drugs.
I think this is mostly to do with there not being enough things for teenagers to do.
I think they should open a 13-17 dance club/night club and only charge £1.00 per person and to be open every friday.
Thisa way the teenagers can stay out of trouble in our local area.
please help us !!
thak you xx

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
